title: SUPER weird problem--please help!
body:
I have a problem that I cannot believe is happening. I didn't realize until this morning what is going on.

Yesterday I submitted several apple support tickets because I'd had 3 mouses die on me in 3 days. One was a mouse I'd been playing with for a while, the following two were cheap mouses. I connect these mouses to my macbook pro, and three died on me in three days. It was only today, using a fourth mouse I found in my house, that I realize what is going on: **When I load into a league game, my mouse dies. And it doesn't just stop responding to this computer. It _dies._ ** It won't work on other computers either. This is a pretty terrible thing, for obvious reasons. Does anyone have ANY idea what this might be about? I'm 100% sure what's going on--this has now happened to 4 mouses in a row.

replies.body:
I can't really think of anyway loading a game like League could completely kill a mouse, that'd be pretty extreme for sure O_O!

Do me a favor and maybe try a different usb (if it's usb connected anyways) and also try doing a quick config reset to make sure your keybinds are still working properly too.

- Launch League and Login
- Right click on your League of Legend Icon and select "Show package contents"
- Navigate to Riot Games\League of Legends
- Delete the Config folder
- Start a Custom Game to verify changes (everything should be reset to default).
